game.name: Lifecycles of the Traveler Spider
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Traveler Spiders are a species unique to their galaxy. A galaxy that is regularly destroyed and rebuilt by the galactic seasons. Ranging from tiny specs to star sized colossi, all the spiders must do their part to restore the natural balance and survive another season.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Traveler Spiders are a species unique to their galaxy. A galaxy that is regularly destroyed and rebuilt by the galactic seasons. Ranging from tiny specs to star sized colossi, all the spiders must do their part to restore the natural balance and survive another season.
